review: It has frequent (almost every time I use it) problems with streaming video, with video playback often pausing while the audio continues. This is on a fast  (30mb download) connection, only ten feet away from the router (both 5ghz and 2.4ghz, clean channels, free from interference). I don't have this problem with any other PC, laptop, or tablet streaming video in my home. Honestly it doesn't feel ready for prime time.

review: It is reasonably well designed, the menus work, but this unit is all about selling you content. It has a clunky interface for searching. I just wasn't expeciting every item that I drilled down on to ask for money.  But hey, I guess we're all in business to make money.
